#summary How to install lysee

= How To Install Lysee =

== 1. LINUX ==

    # Download lysee source to your computer.
    # Unizp it.
    # Compile with: make.
    # Install with: sudo make install.
    # Lysee will be installed to _/usr/local/lib/lysee_.
    # Soft link _/usr/bin/lysee_ will be created and pointer to _/usr/local/lib/lysee/lysee_.

== 2. WINDOWS ==

    # Download the lasted installer to your computer.
    # Run the installer.
    # Just click NEXT untill finished.
    # Add install path to system or current user's environment PATH.
